name: Slime Climb (arqitech)
description:
SLIME CLIMB

A fast-paced action roguelike platformer with a Celeleste-style dash!

(RUNS BEST IN CHROME)

Use your skills to quickly make your way up the chasm and last as long as you can while getting as many points as possible. Gain XP to unlock evolution upgrades!

This game was made over 24 hours for the 24th edition of the ScoreSpace game jam.
All code, sounds and graphics were made during the jam by arqitech.

Advanced gameplay:

- dashing down on a jump pad or enemy will give you a massive jump boost, it will also double the points and XP that you gain!
- getting a level-up will slow down the rate at which the lava rises!

Feel free to post a screenshot of your high score in the comments!

I hope you enjoy the game!
- arqitech ;)
